mapper.sql: Id, EquipmentId, PatientType, PatientId, Creator, CreatedOn, Deleteor, DeleteOn, IsDelete
mapper.select:
select equip.EquipmentNum, equip.DeviceVersionName from EquipmentAndPatient eap LEFT JOIN (select e.Id,e.EquipmentNum,dv.DeviceVersionName from Equipment e LEFT JOIN DeviceVersion dv ON e.EquipmentVersion = dv.Version) equip ON eap.EquipmentId=equip.Id
where eap.PatientId =#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and eap.IsDelete=0

select p.* from EquipmentAndPatient eap LEFT JOIN Equipment e ON eap.EquipmentId = e.Id LEFT JOIN PatientInfo p ON eap.PatientId=p.Id where e.EquipmentNum= #{EquipmentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and eap.IsDelete=0

select eap.Id as epId, eap.Nickname as nickname, equ.Id as Id, equ.fid as fId, equ.Noticeflag as area, equ.EquipmentNum as num, equ.EquipmentVersion as version, equ.DeviceVersionName as versionname, equ.SsyMax as ssymax, equ.SsyMin as ssymin, equ.SzyMax as szymax, equ.SzyMin as szymin, equ.SIMNum as sim from EquipmentAndPatient eap LEFT JOIN (SELECT e.Id,xy.Noticeflag,e.EquipmentNum,e.EquipmentVersion,dv.DeviceVersionName,xy.SsyMax,xy.SsyMin,xy.SzyMax,xy.SzyMin,e.SIMNum,xy.id as fId FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN PJcXybjSet xy ON e.Id=xy.Eid AND xy.Isdelete=0 LEFT JOIN DeviceVersion dv ON e.EquipmentVersion=dv.Version )equ ON eap.EquipmentId =equ.Id LEFT JOIN PatientInfo p ON eap.PatientId=p.Id where p.Id=#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and eap.IsDelete=0
